title: PSA to 51K Followers of Saurav Ganguly’s Insta Account: It’s Fake!
subtitle: Sourav Ganguly took to Twitter on Monday, 6 August to distance himself from an unverified Instagram account with a large following, that was believed to be run by the former India captain.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Earlier in the week, the Instagram account, which had amassed a following of over 50,000, was cited by several news reports after it posted a long post on the Indian cricket team’s loss to England in the first test.

The Indian team lost the series-opener by 31 runs as the English bowling attack overwhelmed Indian batsmen with the exception of Virat Kohli.

The account’s bio described itself as Ex Captain: Indian Cricket Team | President: CAB | Co-Owner: ATK | Author: Juggernaut Books [Post from Sourav himself are signed – SG] https;//www.linkedin.com/sourav-ganguly
